Title: Most Probably Original.
Reviews:
I will sum up my review in following parts.
1. Cap- The first thing I noticed before ordering is that many people received a bottle with different cap, so did I. The only reason I could think of is that company might have run out of red cap. Also checked with other customers on different websites and some of them have also received the product with different cap.
2. Smell/Scent- The sanitizer has strawberry smell, which is different from the other lifebuoy sanitizer but it might be due to the fact that this sanitizer has different composition that the one we buy at our local shop.
3. I checked for any tampering with the bottle but even the Cap has two seals, one at the top of the bottle which we will need to remove before using the sanitizer and the other at the bottom to remove the whole cap from the bottle this is visible in many photos submitted by other reviewers.
4. The sanitizer is flammable so it  does contain a good amount of alcohol.
Overall I am satisfied with the product. But they need to provide a disclaimer about the cap and that the image might be different then the original product.
